snippet.title: Protodroid DeLTA - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Become a Kickstarter Backer today! https://bit.ly/2YxKrWp

Protodroid DeLTA is a 3D-action platformer set in a “Solarpunk” world with a hopeful, yet non-utopian vision of the future. You play as DeLTA, a protodroid, as she fights to save the Radia region from the devastating drone-gang threat. Along her journey, DeLTA will forever change the lives of every person she encounters as the story unfolds.

Inspired by the SNES classic Megaman X, Protodroid DeLTA sets out to modernize the classic and fully translate the fast & fluid 2D gameplay of the X series into 3D.
